Reviews.Title: used phone
Reviews.Author: shevie
Reviews.Content: I'm learning that buying a used phone  from long distance may not be the best way to go,after buying a new battery ,$40,a data card,$16 and a car charger,$20,plus the cost of the phone,I could have bought a new one!  Live and learn!

ProductInfo.Features:
Hi-res 3.2" LCD, TFT capacitive touchscreen, 65K colors
Voice memo/dial/commands - Predictive text input
192 MB RAM, 512 MB ROM
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g, Wi-Fi hotspot (Android 2.2)
Android OS, v1.6 (Donut), upgradable to v2.2
ProductInfo.Name: MyTouch Fender Unlocked
